overview:
AVA provides the complete human capital management solution across the ‘Full Energy Life Cycle’ from concept identification through to trading and consumer channels.

Through our experienced network, AVA is organised and focused through the following structure:

• Executive & Business Management Functions • Technical & Operations

AVA provides:

• Retained Executive Search • Search Process Outsourcing (SPO) • Interim Management • ENR Brokering • Permanent Appointments • Contract Assignments

AVA place senior executives, managers and professional operational staff across the ‘Full Energy Life Cycle’ within:

• Oil & Gas • Power • Cleantech/Renewables • Financial organisations • Engineering & Consulting • Utilities • Mining

As part of the AVA Directorship we have over 45 years’ experience in human capital management and through this expertise and track record, AVA is able to demonstrate significant added value to organisations that are experiencing change, transition, growth or are in need of turnaround, through senior executive hires, interim management, technical and operational permanent hires and the provision of Non-Executive Director appointments.

The AVA brand is synonymous with the highest standards in the industry, reflected in the principles and values of the three Founding Directors. Our bespoke Energy model ensures our clients see significant return on their investment whilst rewarding senior executives highly for exceptional delivery.
